double.name: crossSectionDistanceThreshold
double.label: Cross-section region distance threshold
double.description: The threshold used to determine whether a planar cross-section region is to be considered part of the cross-section computed from the contour derived from the heat flow image. If the shortest distance from all points on the cross-section region is further from the contour than this threshold, it will not be considered part of the cross-section.
